wave_3_per_point11=locn=int(t8);

wave_3_per_point13=r = loci/locn;

wave_3_per_point15=//b = abs(treb_att/5-bass);

wave_3_per_point17=
wave_3_per_point18=nc = sqrt(locn);
wave_3_per_point19=xs=sin(6.28*(loci%(nc))/nc)*sin(3.14*int(loci/nc)/nc);
wave_3_per_point20=ys=cos(6.28*(loci%nc)/nc)*sin(3.14*int(loci/nc)/nc);
wave_3_per_point21=zs=cos(3.14*int(loci/nc)/nc);
wave_3_per_point22=
wave_3_per_point23=//modulate to allow rotation
wave_3_per_point24=y1 = ys*cos(q1)-zs*sin(q1);
wave_3_per_point25=z1 = ys*sin(q1)+zs*cos(q1);
wave_3_per_point26=x1 = z1*sin(q2)+xs*cos(q2);
wave_3_per_point27=z2 = z1*cos(q2)-xs*sin(q2);
wave_3_per_point28=x2 = x1*cos(q3)-y1*sin(q3);
wave_3_per_point29=y2 = y1*cos(q3)+x1*sin(q3);
wave_3_per_point30=
wave_3_per_point31=//translate shape

wave_3_per_point33=y3 = y2;
wave_3_per_point34=z3 = z2+q5;
